languages.text: "Недурно, но есть над чем поработать. Все сдайте оружие, а ты приготовь восхваления повнушительнее к моему возвращению!"
"Not bad, but there is room for improvement. Everyone lay down your weapons, and you, come up with some more impressive words of praise by the time I return!"
languages.original_text: "Недурно, но есть над чем поработать. Все сдайте оружие, а ты приготовь восхваления повнушительнее к моему возвращению!"

traits.locale_text: "Not bad but there is room for improvement. Everyone lay down your weapons, and you, come up with some more impressive words of praise by the time I'm back!"
"Not bad but there is room for improvement. Everyone lay down your weapons, and you, come up with some more impressive words of praise by the time I'm back!"
"Not bad but there is room for improvement. Everyone lay down your weapons, and you, come up with some more impressive words of praise by the time I'm back!"
"Not bad but there is room for improvement. Everyone lay down your weapons, and you, come up with some more impressive words of praise by the time I'm back!"
"Not bad, but there is room for improvement. Everyone lay down your weapons, and you, come up with some more impressive words of praise by the time I return!"
"Not bad, but there is room for improvement. Everyone lay down your weapons, and you, come up with some more impressive words of praise by the time I return!"

languages.text: “说得还不错，不过还有改进的余地。所有人放下武器，等我回来的时候，我要从你们口中听到更多精妙的赞美！”
languages.original_text: "Not bad, but there is room for improvement. Everyone lay down your weapons, and you, come up with some more impressive words of praise by the time I return!"

traits.locale_text: “说得还不错，不过还有改进的余地。所有人放下武器，等我回来的时候，我要从你们口中听到更多精妙的赞美！”

languages.text: "Nicht übel, aber da ist noch Luft nach oben. Legt Eure Waffen nieder, allesamt, und Ihr, lasst Euch noch ein paar beeindruckendere Worte des Lobes einfallen, bis ich zurück bin!"
languages.original_text: "Not bad, but there is room for improvement. Everyone lay down your weapons, and you, come up with some more impressive words of praise by the time I return!"

traits.locale_text: "Nicht übel, aber da ist noch Luft nach oben. Legt Eure Waffen nieder, allesamt, und Ihr, lasst Euch noch ein paar beeindruckendere Worte des Lobes einfallen, bis ich zurück bin!"

languages.text: «No está mal, pero aún se puede mejorar. Que todos depongan las armas; ¡y tú, más vale que se te hayan ocurrido unos elogios más impresionantes para cuando vuelva!».
languages.original_text: "Not bad, but there is room for improvement. Everyone lay down your weapons, and you, come up with some more impressive words of praise by the time I return!"

traits.locale_text: «No está mal, pero aún se puede mejorar. Que todos depongan las armas; ¡y tú, más vale que se te hayan ocurrido unos elogios más impresionantes para cuando vuelva!».

languages.text: « Pas mal, mais vous pouvez faire mieux. Que tout le monde dépose les armes. Quant à vous, tâchez de trouver des louanges plus impressionnantes d'ici à mon retour ! »
languages.original_text: "Not bad, but there is room for improvement. Everyone lay down your weapons, and you, come up with some more impressive words of praise by the time I return!"

traits.locale_text: « Pas mal, mais vous pouvez faire mieux. Que tout le monde dépose ses armes. Quant à vous, tâchez de trouver des louanges plus impressionnantes d'ici à ce que je revienne ! »

languages.text: 「悪くはないが、改善の余地はある。皆、武器を捨てろ。おい、お前。お前は私が戻るまでにもっと印象的な賛辞の言葉を考えておけ！」
languages.original_text: "Not bad, but there is room for improvement. Everyone lay down your weapons, and you, come up with some more impressive words of praise by the time I return!"

traits.locale_text: 「悪くはないが、改善の余地はある。皆、武器を捨てろ。おい、お前。お前は私が戻るまでにもっと印象的な賛辞の言葉を考えておけ！」

languages.text: "Tekniğin iyi ancak geliştirmen lazım. Silahlarınızı bırakın. Sen... Döndüğüm zaman övgülerinle beni etkilemeyi başarman, hepinizin hayrına olur!"
languages.original_text: "Not bad, but there is room for improvement. Everyone lay down your weapons, and you, come up with some more impressive words of praise by the time I return!"
